item.title: Okta Identity Engine
item.description: Okta Identity Engine Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: ‘- Article title change After reading this doc it is rather outdated. We should update this doc and mention Okta’s latest offerings (OIG, PAM, etc) Also even calling it Identity Engine seems rather dated. Consider limiting “Identity Engine” and discuss with teammates Links to original docs: - Okta Identity Engine overview: https://developer.

item.title: The Okta org
item.description: The Okta org Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Doc needs a thorough review and possibly updated to include new org features. Links to original docs: - Okta organizations: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/okta-organizations/ Why is this here?: - Internal workshop session: Session 1 - Team 2 chose the Okta Org group Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation

item.title: Find your Okta Domain
item.description: Find your Okta Domain Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: - Add reasons why you need to know or use this “Okta domain” Links to original docs: - Find your Okta domain: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/find-your-domain/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.

item.title: Admin console
item.description: Admin console Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: Summary overview of the Admin console. I did not find this document on help.okta.com. We could also place this doc in help.okta.com and make this doc an summary redirect doc. Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.

item.title: Global session and authentication policies
item.description: Global session and authentication policies Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: First section in Configure a global session policy and authentication policies: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/configure-signon-policy/main/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: Okta APIs
item.description: Okta APIs Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: - At the Oktane MatchIt game, 35.5% of respondents could not define Okta APIs. In the Oktane GroupIt game, the topics placed under the APIs and SDKs group represented were very broad in scope. This broadness may indicate a lack of clarity of the meaning of API and SDK.

item.title: Okta SDKs
item.description: Okta SDKs Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: - Org setup: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-common-org-setup/android/main/ - SDK overview section and diagrams Auth JS Fundamentals: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/auth-js/main/ - “About the Okta Auth JavaScript SDK” section Why is this here?: - In the Oktane GroupIt game, the topics placed under the APIs and SDKs group represented were very broad in scope.

item.title: Okta Sign-in Widget
item.description: Okta Sign-in Widget Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: - In the Oktane GroupIt game, the Embedded Sign-in Wdiget was placed in a significant amount of groups, which may indicate disagreement over the meaning. Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.
